name: hedgedoc
description: HedgeDoc is an open source collaborative markdown editor that lets multiple users write documents in real time. It supports slide decks, diagrams, media embeds, and integrates easily into self hosted knowledge or documentation stacks.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Multiple users can edit the same document simultaneously with live cursor tracking

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Write in markdown with live preview and syntax highlighting

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Include images, videos, and external content directly in documents

features.title: Version History
features.description: Track changes and revert to previous versions when needed

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Download documents as PDF, HTML, or markdown files
